EmailTemplate.description: This is to be used when reaching out to broker / group to clarify their selection when completing the Substantive Eligibility information on the Benefit Plan Application (BPA).
EmailTemplate.name: Outreach - Substantive Eligibility BPA Verification - Revised 03 2016
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Group_Account_Number__c} - {!Case.Account} Substantive Eligibility Clarification Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
